# Alexandr Antonov

> Frontend Developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable React & TypeScript applications. Expert in performance optimization, e-commerce solutions, and modern web development.

## Live Profile Data

- [Complete Profile API](https://alexandr-antonov.dev/api/profile): Real-time comprehensive data including experience, education, projects, and achievements
- [Homepage](https://alexandr-antonov.dev): Interactive portfolio with current status and recent updates

## Professional Background

- **Experience**: 3+ years at Zalando and Crawless building high-performance web applications
- **Specialization**: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Performance Optimization
- **Focus**: E-commerce solutions and scalable application architecture

## Key Achievements

- [1st Place - Tekwill National Contest 2023](https://tekwill.md): National coding competition winner
- [Performance Optimization Expert](https://alexandr-antonov.dev): Specialized in web performance and optimization
- [Modern Web Development](https://alexandr-antonov.dev): Building with latest web technologies

## Technical Expertise

- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
- **Performance**: Web optimization, code splitting, lazy loading
- **E-commerce**: Large-scale retail application development
- **Web Technologies**: Modern JavaScript, responsive design, accessibility
